member.name: T:INIfierNS.INIfier
member.summary: Used to replace the contents of TextAssets with data from .ini files.

member.name: M:INIfierNS.INIfier.RegisterFile(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Registers a file to replace a TextAsset of the same name.
member.param: The file to register. If the name does not end in .ini it will be appended automatically
The content to place in the file.
Whether to overwrite an existing file.

member.name: M:INIfierNS.INIfier.RegisterFile(System.String,System.Byte[],System.Boolean)
member.summary: Registers a file to replace a TextAsset of the same name.
member.param: The file to register. If the name does not end in .ini it will be appended automatically
The content to place in the file.
Whether to overwrite an existing file.

member.name: M:INIfierNS.INIfier.IsFileRegistered(System.String)
member.summary: Checks whether an asset replacement file exists
member.param: The file to check for. If the name does not end in .ini it will be appended automatically

member.name: M:INIfierNS.INIfier.GetReplacementFileText(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the content of a replacement file
member.param: The file to check for. If the name does not end in .ini it will be appended automatically

member.name: M:INIfierNS.INIfier.GetReplacementFileBytes(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the content of a replacement file
member.param: The file to check for. If the name does not end in .ini it will be appended automatically
